fields.value:

[Display bot's help](https://gifyu.com/)
`/help`
[Display bot's info](https://gifyu.com/)
`/info`

fields.value:
**```ğŸŒŸ ADMINISTRATION COMMANDS```**
[Change the bot's language](https://gifyu.com/)
`/setlanguage`
[Change the bot's main color](https://gifyu.com/)
`/setcolor`
[Set the Welcome channel](https://gifyu.com/)
`/setwelcome`
[Set the Logs channel](https://gifyu.com/)

7.title: ```ğŸ’» Commands | p.7```
7.description: > Welcome to the help page of {bot_user.name}, here you will find the most important information about the bot's commands.

fields.value:
**```ğŸ BONUS COMMANDS```**
[Show anime/manga info](https://gifyu.com/)
`$anime/manga Title`
[Show user profile](https://gifyu.com/)
`$profil @user/user#0000/userid`
[Search a wallpaper](https://gifyu.com/)
`$wallpaper Title`
[Get an image by type](https://gifyu.com/)
`/pics_v(1/2)`
[Generate a password](https://gifyu.com/)
`/passgen`
[Translate a text](https://gifyu.com/)
`/translate`
[Convert a value from another format](https://gifyu.com/)
`/conv`
[(En/De)crypt a text](https://gifyu.com/)
`/crypt`
[Generate a QrCode](https://gifyu.com/)
`/qrgen`

8.title: ```ğŸ’» Commands | p.8```

`/resprofil`

`/die`
